price: I puhnut će se u rog, pa će oni iz grobova prema Gospodaru svom pohrliti.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَنسِلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fa-idhā hum mina al-ajdāthi ilā rabbihim yansilūna
